Bee Definition¶

Defining a bee

Primary Color¶

Hex Color Code for the primary color of the bee, and spawn egg.

Required if not using a custom texture. One of two main key: values needed to create a bee. (If not using custom texture.)

Value: String (Hex color code)

"primaryColor": "#f2f24f"

Secondary Color¶

Hex Color Code for the primary color of the bee, and spawn egg.

Required if not using a custom texture. One of two main key: values needed to create a bee. (If not using custom texture.)

Value: String (Hex color code)

"primaryColor": "#f2f24f"

Particle Color¶

Hex Color Code for the particles the bees emit.

Value: String (Hex color code)

"secondaryColor": "#d0581f"

Bee Texture¶

If you would like to use a custom texture for your bee, other wise the default one with the colors will be used instead.

Value: String (resource location)

"beeTexture": "productivebees:textures/entity/bee/base/bee"

Create Comb¶

Whether or not to create a comb for your bee.

Value: boolean

"createComb": true

Attack Response¶

This is for if you would like your bee to use a different attack response. Valid options are fire, and lava.

Values: [ “fire”, “lava” ]

"attackResponse": "fire"

Teleportation¶

If you would like for your bee to be able to teleport. Such as the Ender bee for example. (This could prove to make things interesting lol.)

Value: boolean

"teleporting": true

Fire Proof¶

Is your bee fireproof?

Value: boolean

"fireproof": true

Translucent¶

Should your bee be translucent?

Value: boolean

"translucent": false

Draconic¶

Allows for your bee to live in egg hives and gives them protection from dragon’s breath attack;

Value: boolean

"draconic": true

Redstone¶

Should your bee emit a redstone signal?

Value: boolean

"redstoned": true

Slimy¶

Whether or not your bee drips particles.

Value: boolean

"slimy": true

Withering¶

Whether or not your bee gives a withered effect.

Value: boolean

"withered": true

Blinding¶

Whther or not your bee gives a blinding effect.

Value: boolean

"blinding": true

Munchies¶

Does your bee give hunger to nearby people?

Value: boolean

"munchies": false

Additional Attributes¶

These are additional attributes for your bee. Such as weathr tolerance, productivity, etc. Each of these key: value pairs are optional. You can include one or all.

Value: boolean

"attributes": {
        "temper": 1,
        "endurance": 2,
        "behavior": 2,
        "productivity": 2,
        "weather_tolerance": 2
}
